name: Everyone is Afraid to be Forgotten
name_original: Everyone is Afraid to be Forgotten
description:
Based on real feelings and relationships with the close ones.

Move with WASD or arrows. Click buttons with a mouse to talk. Scroll mouse wheel to zoom in/zoom out. You can also take pictures of a landscape with your old polaroid-like camera, if you dare.

Warning: this game has several fast-moving, strobing, blinking images that may be not suitable for people with epilepsy. If you feel nauseous, or your head starts aching, immediately stop the game.

Made for Mini Jam 65: Abandoned. Don't forget to rate it here, it matters.

City tileset by Withering Systems.

Music by Kevin MacLeod: Youtube / Website.

Made with ct.js.
